page.title: 16TRAFFIC COUNT
page.content: We counted the traffic on the road from St Andrews to Cupar, the time 1415 hours to 1515 hours. There have been many accidents on this road and it is fairly busy all the time. The result of this traffic count was 674 vehicles going to and from St Andrews. There was a total of 527 cars, 40 commercial vehicles, 77 light vans, 6 buses, 6 taxis, 5 coaches, 4 motor bicycles, 3 scooters, 2 cars and caravans and 4 bicycles. This road is used for commercial use quite often as it is midway between the city of Dundee and St Andrews.
